H0.text: How many fences do horses need to encounter at the Grand National. 25

H1.text: How many fences do horses need to encounter at the Grand National. 20

H2.text: How many fences do horses need to encounter at the Grand National. 28

H3.text: How many fences do horses need to encounter at the Grand National. 30

A4.text: The Grand National course is a left-handed triangular shaped course of about 2 miles 2 furlongs, with 16 fences, including three open ditches and a water jump.
